channel.title: Diane Finley

item.title: Mentioned by BlackburnNews.com
item.description:
Looking Forward To New Bridge
Pictured with Lakeshore Mayor Tom Bain (left) and Essex MP Jeff Watson (right). Federal minister Diane Finley is hoping there won't be too much time between the completion of the Herb Gray Parkway and a new international bridge crossing. The minister of ...

item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by CHCH News
item.description:
U.S. Steel workers picket
U.S. Steel workers picket. 2013-0802PicketsEN6. U.S. Steel union workers are picketing MP Diane Finley's office in Simcoe because they want answers. They're demanding that Finley help bring an end to a 3 month labour dispute. The union just rejected the ...

item.description:
Steelworkers demand MP's help with dispute
Locked out steelworkers Twila Smith (left), Tracy Graham, and Wayne Whetherup picket in front of local MP Diane Finley's office in downtown Simcoe on Thursday. The United Steelworkers Local 8782 plan to hold a protest there Friday. (DANIEL R. PEARCE ...

item.title: Mentioned by Spruce Grove Examiner
item.description:
Ambrose ready for new role as health minister
ANDRE FORGET QMI Agency Ministers Rob Nicholson, Peter McKay, Rona Ambrose and Diane Finley were at Rideau Hall for Prime Minister Stephen Harper's cabinet shuffle in Ottawa on Monday. Tweet · Bookmark and Share. Change text size for the story. Print. Report an error. Edmonton - Spruce Grove MP Rona Ambrose was named the federal government's new health minister by Prime Minister Stephen Harper on July 15. Previously the Minister of Public Works and Government Services as well as Minister for ...
